attributes.review: I wanted to support bunker boi but this isn’t it. This app stole all of my self tanning lotion and gave it to bunker boi.

attributes.review: The moment I opened this app I wanted to bleach my eyes. not only is this man DISGUSTING, he’s disappointing, orange, and an overall embarrassment

attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER THE MOMENT I OPENED THE APP I SAW THE MOST DISGUSTING CREATURE I BARFED THE WHOLE DAY SO I WENT TO THE HOSPITAL AND THE DOCTOR asked what happened and I showed her and she passed out , had a stroke, and now is in a coma  so THANKS TO THIS HORRIBLE APP I AM SCARED TO GO NEAR IT AGAIN WORST APP TO EVER BE MADE 🤢🤢🤢
